# [Everviz](https://app.everviz.com)

Everviz Provider

## Implementation Details

- Provider
Name: Everviz
- Documentation: NONE
- HTTPS support: YES
- Fake Response: NO
- Oembed Params: maxwidth , maxheight
- Supported Hosts: app.everviz.com
- Responsive response: NO
- Collections: DefaultProviderCollection
